edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.ciphertext

Class CramerShoupOnByteArrayCiphertext

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.ciphertext.CramerShoupCiphertext
      • edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.ciphertext.CramerShoupOnByteArrayCiphertext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsymmetricCiphertext

    public class CramerShoupOnByteArrayCiphertext
extends CramerShoupCiphertext
    This class is a container that encapsulates the cipher data resulting from applying the CramerShoupDDHOnByteArray encryption.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)

    • Method Detail

      • getE

        public byte[] getE()

      • generateSendableData

        public AsymmetricCiphertextSendableData generateSendableData()
        Description copied from interface: AsymmetricCiphertext
        This function is used when an asymmetric ciphertext needs to be sent via a Channel or any other means of sending data (including serialization). It retrieves all the data needed to reconstruct this ciphertext at a later time and/or in a different VM. It puts all the data in an instance of the relevant class that implements the AsymmetricCiphertextSendableData interface.
        Returns:
        the AsymmetricCiphertextSendableData object

        public java.lang.String toString()
